title: Professional Boundaries and Self-Protection
description: Maintain professional boundaries and protect yourself from inappropriate requests or behavior

phrases.spanish: No me siento cómodo/a con eso
phrases.pronunciation: noh meh see-EN-toh KOH-moh-doh kon EH-soh

phrases.english: That's outside the scope of my service
phrases.spanish: Eso está fuera del alcance de mi servicio
phrases.pronunciation: EH-soh es-TAH FWEH-rah del al-KAN-seh deh mee ser-VEE-see-oh

phrases.english: I need to end this trip for safety reasons
phrases.spanish: Necesito terminar este viaje por razones de seguridad
phrases.pronunciation: neh-seh-SEE-toh ter-mee-NAR ES-teh vee-AH-heh por rah-SOH-nes deh seh-goo-ree-DAD

phrases.english: I will report this to the platform
phrases.spanish: Voy a reportar esto a la plataforma
phrases.pronunciation: voy ah reh-por-TAR ES-toh ah lah plah-tah-FOR-mah

phrases.spanish: Por favor respete mis límites profesionales
phrases.pronunciation: por fah-VOR res-PEH-teh mees LEE-mee-tes proh-feh-see-oh-NAH-les

culturalNotes.note: Platforms take harassment seriously. You have the right to refuse service and report immediately
culturalNotes.colombianComparison: More formal worker protection systems than in Colombian informal economy

culturalNotes.note: Never share personal phone number, address, or social media. Keep all contact through app
culturalNotes.colombianComparison: Stricter privacy boundaries than Colombian relationship-building culture

culturalNotes.note: Any romantic or sexual advance from customer is inappropriate and reportable
culturalNotes.colombianComparison: US workplace has stricter boundaries than Colombian flirtation culture

culturalNotes.note: Trust your instincts. You can end service if you feel unsafe - platform will support you
culturalNotes.colombianComparison: You have more authority to refuse service than traditional Colombian service roles

practicalScenarios.situation: Customer asks for your personal phone number
practicalScenarios.spanishResponse: Por política de la plataforma, toda comunicación debe ser a través de la aplicación para protección de ambos.
practicalScenarios.englishTranslation: Per platform policy, all communication must be through the app for both our protection.
practicalScenarios.tips: Reference platform policy, not personal preference

practicalScenarios.spanishResponse: Agradezco el comentario, pero mantengo relaciones estrictamente profesionales con los clientes.
practicalScenarios.englishTranslation: I appreciate the comment, but I maintain strictly professional relationships with customers.
practicalScenarios.tips: Polite but firm. Document and report after trip

practicalScenarios.spanishResponse: Por su seguridad y la mía, necesito que permanezca sentado/a y tranquilo/a. Si no puede, tendré que terminar el viaje.
practicalScenarios.englishTranslation: For your safety and mine, I need you to remain seated and calm. If you cannot, I'll have to end the trip.
practicalScenarios.tips: Safety first. Pull over if necessary. Call platform support or 911 if threatened

practicalScenarios.situation: Customer asks you to break law (speed, run red light, etc.)
practicalScenarios.spanishResponse: No puedo hacer eso ya que viola la ley y las políticas de la plataforma. Podría perder mi capacidad de trabajar.
practicalScenarios.englishTranslation: I cannot do that as it violates the law and platform policies. I could lose my ability to work.
practicalScenarios.tips: Reference both law and economic consequence

practicalScenarios.situation: Customer asks you to wait without pay or off-app
practicalScenarios.spanishResponse: Con gusto puedo esperar, pero necesito que esto se registre en la aplicación para que ambos estemos protegidos y se calcule correctamente.
practicalScenarios.englishTranslation: I'm happy to wait, but I need this recorded in the app so we're both protected and it's calculated correctly.
practicalScenarios.tips: Always keep transactions on platform for your protection
